jump_scares.spoiler: A shadowy presence moves behind Dr. Crowe and girlfriend
A lady walks past Cole while he is in the toilet
Cole notices bodies hanging in the school hallway
The ghost of a boy walks through the hallway behind Cole
The boy ghost turns around to reveal a gaping wound on the back of his head
Anna Crowe and her new boyfriend are startled by a window breaking
The vomiting ghost girl suddenly appears in Cole’s tent. [Video
The vomiting girl’s hand comes out from underneath her bed to grab Cole. [Video
